Plot: A FedEx executive must transform himself physically and emotionally to survive a crash landing on a deserted island.
Title: Cast Away
Actors: Paul Sanchez, Lari White, Leonid Citer, David Allen Brooks
tomatoConsensus: Flawed but fascinating, Cast Away offers an intelligent script, some of Robert Zemeckis' most mature directing, and a showcase performance from Tom Hanks.
Awards: Nominated for 2 Oscars. Another 15 wins & 33 nominations.
